channel.title: Adding anims and gfx
channel.description:
Well i added my dragon claws emote and anims to client, but it dont work. I heard that i have to add some stuff server sided. How do i do this!!
Please explain detailed i really need dragon claw emote ://

item.title: Adding anims and gfx
item.dc:creator: @Chosen_Pkz Chosen Pkz
item.description:
@Chosen_Pkz wrote:

Hey dude, i am sorry i dont wanna bug you time, but i was think about just uploading my client.java server sided and my class20 client sided and see if you can do? ill upload you the d claw anim dat and the emote.

Is this okay?

Well here is link if you want - http://www.mediafire.com/?zddtmzodgy4

item.title: Adding anims and gfx
item.dc:creator: @Nubz Nubz
item.description:
@Nubz wrote:

[quote=“Chosen Pkz, post:3, topic:328337”]I am using the synergy pkz source.
Dragon claws id is 8002.
uhmm man i really need to do this[/quote]
Change your (“emote”) from 3997 to 10001 in client.java (server sided)
(Client Side)Go into your class20.java or your animation.java or whatever you young kids have these days and change public static int FrameStart[] = new int[1800]; to public static int FrameStart[] = new int[10000];

Read full topic

item.description:
@Nubz wrote:

Type “emote” in client.java or where ever you place your commands, change the 3997 to 10000? Idk. Depends on what server source/client you’re using.
